# uptime_integration_slack (Resource)

Slack integration resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptime_integration_slack" "example" {
  name        = "My Slack Integration"
  webhook_url = "https://hooks.slack.com/services/your-webhook-url"
  channel     = "#monitoring"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) Slack webhook URL

### Optional

- `channel` (String) Slack channel to post to (overrides webhook default)
- `contact_groups` (Set of String) List of contact group names to receive notifications.
Each contact group can contain multiple contacts (email addresses, phone numbers, or integrations)
that will be notified when alerts are triggered. Defaults to ['Default'] if not specified.
Set to an empty list to disable notifications at this level and rely on parent check group notifications instead.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `url` (String)
